item.name: Create Free-text String Attribute Definition on Classification
Create Pre-defined Numeric Attribute Definition on Tag
Create Pre-defined Numeric Attribute List Value
Create String Attribute Value on Entry
Add Numeric Attribute List Value on Tag
Create External ID for Document Version
Lookup Entries with particular Tags that have External IDs

body.raw:
{
    "query": "\"free-text search for a phrase in a Document text, Document title, and Entry title\"",
    "attributes": ["documentVersions.fileName"],
    "queryAttributes": ["documentVersions.text", "entry.title", "title"],
    "expand": ["entry", "documentVersions"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

{
    "query": "a free-text search that wil match if any of the terms exist are found in the Document text, Document title, or Entry title",
    "attributes": ["documentVersions.fileName"],
    "queryAttributes": ["documentVersions.text", "entry.title", "title"],
    "expand": ["entry", "documentVersions"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

item.name: Free-text regular search in a single Section

body.raw:
{
    "query": "a free-text search that wil match if any of the terms exist are found in the Document text, Document title, or Entry title",
    "filterQuery": "entry.section.id=@sectionId",
    "parameters": {"sectionId": "8961b525-48b9-4e9a-924b-16b1acae6d2f"},
    "attributes": ["documentVersions.fileName"],
    "queryAttributes": ["documentVersions.text", "entry.title", "title"],
    "expand": ["entry", "documentVersions"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

{
    "query": "\"free-text search for a phrase in the Entry title or Tag title\"",
    "queryAttributes": ["title", "tags.title"],
    "expand": ["tags"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

{
    "query": "a free-text search that wil match if any of the terms exist are found in the Entry or Tag title",
    "queryAttributes": ["title", "tags.title"],
    "expand": ["tags"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

item.name: Free-text regular search in a single Section

body.raw:
{
    "query": "a free-text search that wil match if any of the terms exist are found in the Entry or Tag title",
    "filterQuery": "section.id=@sectionId",
    "parameters": {"sectionId": "8961b525-48b9-4e9a-924b-16b1acae6d2f"},
    "queryAttributes": ["title"],
    "expand": ["section"],
    "page": 1,
    "pageSize": 10
}

item.name: Global administrator w/o rights to change permissions
1. Create Access Group with w/o rights to change permissions

request.description: Create an access group with all permissions

item.name: 1. Create Access Group full read permissions

request.description: Create an access group with full read permissions

item.name: Global administrator w/ rights to change permissions
1. Create Access Group w/ rights to change permissions

request.description: Create an access group with all permissions

item.name: User with access to a single Section and its Classifications
1. Create Access Group with permissions to Upload documents

request.description: Create an access group with all permissions. Make note of the ID of the access group as you will use it in the next steps.

item.name: 2. Create a Section with the desired group permissions

request.description:
Create a section and  specify explicitPermissions for the group you just created.

The ReadObject and ReadChildren permissions are mandatory if you would like members of this group to have access to the section.

Grant CreateChildren, DeleteChildren, UpdateChildren, UpdateChildrenSystemFields permissions based on the use case.

item.name: 3. Update the permissions of the classifications linked to the seciton

request.description:
Create a section and  specify explicitPermissions for the group you just created.

The ReadObject and ReadChildren permissions are mandatory if you would like members of this group to have access to the data in the classification.

Grant CreateChildren, DeleteChildren, UpdateChildren, UpdateChildrenSystemFields permissions based on the use case.

item.name: 1. Create Access Group with permissions to Upload documents

request.description: Create an access group with no permissions. Make note of the ID of the access group as you will use it in the next steps.

item.name: 2. Create a Section with the desired group permissions

request.description:
Create a section and  specify explicitPermissions for the group you just created. The group must have the ReadObject permission, BUT not the ReadChildren permission. Otherwise, the group will gain full access to the section.

Grant CreateChildren, DeleteChildren, UpdateChildren, UpdateChildrenSystemFields permissions based on the use case.

item.name: 3. Update the permissions of the classifications linked to the seciton

request.description:
Create a classification and  specify explicitPermissions for the group you just created.

Specify only the ReadObject permission so that the group can see the classification, but not any of its tags... for now.

Make sure you set "determinesAccessControl" to true so that the Classification and its Tags are considered for access control purposes.

Grant CreateChildren, DeleteChildren, UpdateChildren, UpdateChildrenSystemFields permissions based on the use case.

item.name: 4. Update the permissions of a tag in the classification to be used for access control

request.description:
Create a tag and  specify explicitPermissions for the group you just created.

Specify only the ReadObject permission so that the group can see the tag that will grant it access.

Also, specify the ReadEntries permission so that the group gains access to any Entries linked to this Tag.
